While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target perceives its reality as though in a dream, and the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks. The target may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. When the effect ends, the target retains no memory of events that transpired while it was {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Menacing Presence
entries: If the archon has fewer than 90 hit points, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the archon until the beginning of the archon's next turn. A creature that passes this save is immune to the Menacing Presence of this archon for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes three attacks with its trumpet blade, one of which it may replace with its Clarion Call, if available.

action.name: Trumpet Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage. Before or after this attack, the archon's trumpet may become a greatsword, or vice versa.

action.name: Clarion Call {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear the archon has its life essence bolstered. Non-undead creatures affected by this ability cannot be reduced below 1 HP until the beginning of the archon's next turn. Fiends and Undead creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the beginning of the archon's next turn.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Trumpet Blast
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the archon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage and be {@condition deafened} for the next minute. A Celestial or Fiend that fails this save by 5 or more is banished to its home plane.

trait.name: Menacing Presence
entries: If the archon has fewer than 69 hit points, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the archon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the archon until the beginning of the archon's next turn. A creature that passes this save is immune to the Menacing Presence of this archon for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Far-Seeing
entries: The archon cannot be surprised. If it would otherwise be surprised, it acts on initiative count 20 this combat, instead of rolling initiative.

trait.name: Concussive Strength
entries: A creature knocked {@condition prone} by the archon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be unable to stand on its following turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two attacks with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. This attack does an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bear Hug
entries: One creature within 5 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 9d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition grappled}. While the archon has a creature {@condition grappled} in this way, it cannot use its multiattack.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Crush
entries: As a reaction to a creature the archon has {@condition grappled} speaking or casting a spell with a verbal component, the archon crushes the air out of its lungs. The creature immediately begins to suffocate.

trait.name: Calm and Ready
entries: Creatures of the archon's choice within 30 ft. have advantage on initiative checks and on saving throws against Fear.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The archon can use its action to polymorph into any canine, such as a wolf, dog or fox, or back into its true form, which is celestial. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed, and isn't usable while polymorphed. It reverts to its celestial form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archon makes two melee attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} if it is a medium or smaller creature.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} per colpire, portata 5 ft., un bersaglio. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) danni perforanti.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Loyal Defender
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 5 ft. being hit with an attack, the archon may cause the attack to hit it instead.

trait.name: Peaceful Illumination
entries: The archon sheds bright sunlight in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet. Creatures illuminated by it have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to deescalate conflict.

action.name: Celestial Aid
entries: Up to three creatures within 60 ft. each gain 10 temporary hit points. While a creature has any of those temporary hit points, its vision is not impeded by ordinary or magical darkness.

action.name: Light the Path
entries: One creature within 60 ft. sees the shortest and most direct physical route to their current destination illuminated before them for the next eight hours, if such a route exists.

action.name: Plane Shift
entries: The archon teleports to a location it is familiar with on this or another plane.

reaction.name: Oppressive Radiance
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack or harmful spell, the archon fires a beam of holy light at the attacker or spell caster. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) radiant damage, or half as much on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition blinded} until the end of the archon's next turn.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The solar's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the Solar is attacking with them.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cowing Presence
entries: If the solar has at least 122 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the solar must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the solar until the beginning of its next turn. A creature has advantage on this save if it took damage from the solar since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the solar has 121 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the solar must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the solar until the beginning of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature has vulnerability to radiant damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The solar attacks with its sword twice, one of which it may replace with a longbow attack..

action.name: Sword of Ruin
entries: The solar slashes with its sword and a line of incandescent light 5 feet wide and 30 feet long appears within 120 feet and lasts for a minute. A creature that starts its turn in one or more such lines, or enters one for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Lifeburst Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage and the target is pushed back 10 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage per unexpended hit die it has, then recovers one hit die.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
entries: The solar touches another creature that is alive, or has been dead for no more than a century. If the target was dead, it is restored to life with 1 HP. Then, the target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last century, it is restored to life.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until magic such as the {@spell lesser restoration} spell removes the blindness.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The planetar's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the planetar is attacking with them.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Cowing Presence
entries: If the planetar has at least 101 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the planetar must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the planetar until the beginning of its next turn. A creature has advantage on this save if it took damage from the planetar since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the planetar has 100 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the planetar must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the planetar until the beginning of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature has vulnerability to radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Sword of Wrath
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage and the creature must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to salt and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Plague of Locusts
entries: Each creature of the planetar's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) piercing damage. Until the end of the planetar's next turn, the affected area is difficult terrain and heavily obscured for all other creatures.

action.name: Judgement of Heaven
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The planetar touches another creature that is alive, or has been dead for no more than ten days. If the target was dead, it is restored to life with 1 HP. Then, the target magically regains 30 ({@dice 6d8 + 3}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last century, it is restored to life.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The angel's weapons are manifestations of its innate divine magic, and appear only as the angel is attacking with them.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Numinous Presence
entries: If the angel has at least 69 HP, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the angel must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be unable to take hostile action against the angel until the beginning of its next turn. A creature passes this save automatically if it took damage from the angel since the end of its last turn.

trait.name: Wrathful Presence
entries: If the angel has 68 HP or fewer, a creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the angel must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the angel until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: As a bonus action, the deva may  transform into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in any form, and it reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Luminous Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a corpse that died in the last 10 days, it is restored to life.

reaction.name: Shielding Wings
entries: As a reaction to an ally being hit with an attack, the deva may move up to half its speed. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of the targeted creature, the creature's AC is increased by 2 (including against the triggering attack) and the deva's AC is decreased by 2 until the end of the deva's next turn.

reaction.name: Radiant Retribution
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack,

the deva may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend each unexpended hit die it has, rolling each of them and taking radiant damage equal to the total rolled.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Il lupo ha vantaggio nelle prove di Saggezza (Percezione) che si basano sull'udito o sull'olfatto.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Il lupo ha vantaggio ai tiri di attacco contro una creatura se almeno uno dei suoi alleati si trova entro 2 metri dalla creatura e l'alleato non lo è {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Predatory Bearing
entries: Una creatura che inizia il suo turno senza alleati adiacenti e che può vedere il lupo deve riuscire in un tiro salvezza di Saggezza {@dc 13} o subire {@condition frightened} fino all'inizio del suo prossimo turno.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wolf can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the wolf and at least one of the wolf's allies must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 24 ({@damage 7d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Il lupo ha vantaggio nelle prove di Saggezza (Percezione) che si basano sull'udito o sull'olfatto.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Il lupo ha vantaggio ai tiri di attacco contro una creatura se almeno uno dei suoi alleati si trova entro 2 metri dalla creatura e l'alleato non lo è {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wolf can grapple the target (escape {@dc 11}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Worry
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by both the wolf and at least one of the wolf's allies must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is {@condition invisible} to the stirge queen. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge queen.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge queen has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

trait.name: Bleeding Aura
entries: When a creature that does not have all of its hit points starts its turn within 30 feet of the stirge queen, the stirge queen can force it to lose 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points. A creature with fewer than half of its hit points instead loses 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the stirge queen fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Pinning Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Blood Spear:
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is pushed 5 ft. away.

action.name: Plague Blood Torrent {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature in a 20 foot cone must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is infected with {@disease redding ague|ConfC}.

reaction.name: Fend Off
entries: As a reaction to a creature entering its reach, the stirge queen may make an attack against the creature with its pinning talons.

reaction.name: Feed Your Queen
entries: As a reaction to a friendly stirge that has fed recently ending its movement within 5 feet of it, the stirge queen consumes the stirge, gaining 14 ({@dice 4d6}) temporary hit points.

reaction.name: Awaken Their Hunger (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 62 hit points, the stirge queen lets out a telepathic signal. Each other stirge within 30 feet may make a melee attack as a reaction.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is {@condition invisible} to the stirge. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract The {@disease redding ague|ConfC}. The stirge attaches to the target While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 6 ({@dice 1d4 + 4}) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement.

reaction.name: Pierce Skull
entries: As a reaction to a creature the stirge is attached to dropping to 0 HP, the stirge repositions itself, piercing the creature's head and gaining control of its body. As a bonus action, the stirge may force the creature to move up to half its speed and make a melee attack against a creature in range. The host automatically fails death saving throws while the stirge is attached, but can still be saved if the stirge is killed in time.

trait.name: Breath Sight
entries: A creature that does not need to breathe is {@condition invisible} to the stirge. A creature that holds its breath has advantage on checks made to hide from the stirge.

trait.name: Weakness Seeker
entries: The stirge has advantage on attacks that target creatures afflicted with a disease.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract The {@disease redding ague|ConfC}. The stirge attaches to the target While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to blood loss. The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Il ragno può arrampicarsi su superfici difficili, anche a testa in giù sui soffitti, senza dover effettuare una prova di abilità.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: Mentre è a contatto con una ragnatela, il ragno conosce la posizione esatta di qualsiasi altra creatura a contatto con la stessa ragnatela.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Il ragno ignora le limitazioni di movimento causate dalle fettucce.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes two attacks with its legs, one of which it may replace with a bite attack or a use of its web ability.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, freeing itself on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a {@condition grappled} or {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 13}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Il ragno può arrampicarsi su superfici difficili, anche a testa in giù sui soffitti, senza dover effettuare una prova di abilità.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: Mentre è a contatto con una ragnatela, il ragno conosce la posizione esatta di qualsiasi altra creatura a contatto con la stessa ragnatela.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Il ragno ignora le limitazioni di movimento causate dalle fettucce.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature is reduced to 0 HP while {@condition poisoned}, the target stabilizes automatically. The spider may make this attack as a bonus action against a {@condition prone} enemy.

action.name: Legs
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hits: 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Deadly Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: If the spider jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the spider's space into the nearest unoccupied space.

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a {@condition grappled} or {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Spider Climb

trait.name: Web Sense

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: The spider launches webbing in a 10 foot radius within 60 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Strength check, freeing itself on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

bonus.name: Bind
entries: The spider may use its webbing to restrain a {@condition grappled} or {@condition prone} target (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is Medium or smaller, the spider may then attach the creature to its back as part of this action.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the cobra takes any cold damage, its speed is reduced by 10 until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Braille
entries: The cobra's eyes are covered by transparent scales that protect them from harm. It has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and advantage on saving throws to avoid being {@condition blinded}.

entries: If the bull moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the bull can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Reckless Follow-Through
entries: At the start of its turn, the bull can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn. If it misses with an attack this turn, it is {@condition stunned} until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thrashing Horns
entries: Two creatures on opposite sides of the bull must each succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) piercing damage and be pushed 10 feet away, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Gouging Toss
entries: As a reaction to a creature moving within 5 ft. of it, the bull forces the creature to succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Stampede

trait.name: Pounce

Se il bersaglio è {@condition prone}, il gatto può effettuare un attacco con morso contro di esso come azione bonus.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Claw

reaction.name: Bat Away

reaction.name: Cruel Jest

entries: The badger can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

entries: A wildshaped druid reverts to its normal form when it drops to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The axe beak has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the axe beak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Vicious
entries: The axe beak scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Burst of Speed {@recharge 5}
entries: The axe beak may dash as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The axe beak makes one attack with its beak and two with its kick.

action.name: Beak

action.name: Kick

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The aurumvorax can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

trait.name: Ornery
entries: The aurumvorax does not die or fall {@condition unconscious} due to dropping to 0 HP if it was attacked by a hostile creature since the end of its previous turn. If the badger starts its turn with 0 HP without having been attacked since the end of its previous turn, it dies.

trait.name: Incredible Density
entries: The aurumvorax has advantage on attempts to shove creatures, and on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would shove it or knock it {@condition prone}. The aurumvorax may grapple or shove creatures up to three sizes larger than it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aurumvorax makes five attacks: one with its locking jaws and four with its scrabbling claws. It may replace any of its claw attacks with a Shove attempt.

action.name: Locking Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can bite only
the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Scrabbling Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If this attack is made at advantage, it does an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage.

variant.name: Note: Treasure Beasts
entries: The corpse of an aurumvorax contains roughly 150-200 lbs of gold that may be smelted from it, for a total value of 3,000-4,000 gp. Its hide can be used as a component in crafting Armor of Fire Resistance.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap
entries: The ape's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start. If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any large or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage to a {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Hurl
entries: The ape hurls a huge or smaller {@condition grappled} creature up to 40 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the ape can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Juggernaut Leap

If the ape jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, is instead pushed 5 feet out of the ape's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The uvuudaum has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The uvuudaum can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 10 foot radius around the uvuudaum is difficult terrain, as the uvuudaum's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

trait.name: Four Dimensional
entries: Time does not seem to pass during the Uvuudaum's turn. It does not provoke attacks of opportunity, and its melee attacks are made at advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The uvuudaum makes three attacks with its head spike.

action.name: Head Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target has its Wisdom score reduced by {@dice 1d6}, to a minimum of 1. If this reduces the target below 10 Wisdom, the target suffers one additional effect of the uvuudaum's choice. The uvuudaum may not choose the same effect twice in a turn:

items.name: Amnesia
entries: The target loses a chunk of memory, reducing its proficiency bonus by 1 for the next minute.

items.name: Anoxia
entries: If the target cast a spell since the end of the uvuudaum's previous turn, it loses the ability to cast that spell until it completes a long rest.

items.name: Apnea
entries: The target forgets how to breathe. At the end of each of its turns, it may make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, remembering how to breathe on a success.

items.name: Mania
entries: On the target's next turn, it may make one melee attack as a bonus action, but its targets are selected at random from those it can reach with its movement.

items.name: Paranoia
entries: The target becomes {@condition frightened} of one of its allies until the end of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, it cannot willingly accept assistance from that ally.

items.name: Seizure
entries: If the target casts a spell on its following turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and end its turn.

reaction.name: Ruin Mind
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 15 ft. hitting it with an attack, the uvuudaum uses its multiattack, targeting the attacker with each attack.

reaction.name: Scuttle
entries: As a reaction to being forced to make a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the uvuudaum moves up to half of its speed. If this movement puts the uvuudaum out of range or area of the spell or magical effect, the uvuudaum is unaffected.

reaction.name: Psychic Storm
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 115 hit points, the uvuudaum lets out a telepathic shriek. Each creature within 60 ft. that has a Wisdom score of 1 is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Adamantine Shell
entries: The spirrax has a shell of pure adamantine that protects it from most harm. If it has fewer than 163 hit points, the spirrax cannot use its fly speed while encased in its shell and attacks against it are made at advantage while encased in its shell. While encased in its shell, the spirrax has the following traits:

items.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The spirrax can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

items.name: Critical Immunity
entries: Any critical hit against the spirax becomes a normal hit.

items.name: Increased AC
entries: The spirrax gains +6 to its AC (included).

items.name: Impenetrable Flank
entries: A creature receives no benefit from flanking the spirrax.

items.name: Constrained
entries: The spirrax makes four fewer attacks with its multiattack.

trait.name: Aura of Indifference
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 120 ft. of the spirrax must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become indifferent to the spirrax's presence until the beginning of its next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more retains no memory of the affected period after the spirrax leaves.

trait.name: Implosion
entries: When the spirrax dies, the dimensional gate contained within it implodes. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be sucked in and transported to a random plane. A creature that succeeds on this save may use its reaction to repeat the save to rescue a creature that failed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirrax makes two attacks with its lashing tendrils, or makes six attacks and takes the Dash action if it is out of its shell.

action.name: Lashing Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Instead of grappling a creature, the spirrax may force it to succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the spirax is thrown up to 60 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Void Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature, object or creation of magical force within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 75 ({@damage 10d6 + 40}) force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated.

reaction.name: Foul Emergance (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage while below 163 hit points, the spirax surges out of its shell in a tide of whirling tentacles. As part of this reaction, the spirrax may move up to its speed and use its multiattack. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the spirax's next turn.

variant.name: Note: Adamantine Shell
entries: The shell of a spirrax contains roughly 16,000 gp worth of adamantine.

trait.name: Cold Blooded
entries: If the tzakandi takes cold damage, it cannot make more than one attack on its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tzakandi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tzakandi makes three attacks, one of which may be with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) psychic damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Hooked Pike
entries: Mischia: {@hit 4} per colpire, portata 10 m, un bersaglio. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) danni da taglio. Se il bersaglio è montato, viene trascinato dalla sua cavalcatura e subisce ulteriori 3 ({@damage 1d6}) danni da percosse.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the tzakandi. {@h}The target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the tzakandi kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Haywire Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The tzakandi spits a globule of psychoactive acid. One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the tzakandi's next turn.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Outburst
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 49 hit points, the tzakandi lashes out telekinetically. Each creature within 20 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph itself or another slaad into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite, and two with its claws. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its Uncontrolled Burst or Madness Croak, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Pandemoniac Ideal (Concentration)
entries: The slaad creates the image of an object or creature no larger than a 20-foot cube. It seems real to all senses, though a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals its illusory nature. The slaad may interact with the illusion physically as though it were real.

action.name: Madness Croak
entries: Each creature (including the slaad) in a 30 ft. radius must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use its reaction to make a melee attack against a radom creature in range. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Uncontrolled Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each other creature within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) force damage and be pushed 15 feet away, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The slaad and any number of slaadi adjacent to it teleport to a different plane of existence.

reaction.name: Lose Cohesion
entries: As a reaction to taking 15 or more damage from a single source, the slaad may disintegrate into a shower of fine particles, reforming at any point within 10 ft. at the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph itself or another slaad into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite, and two with its claws. It may replace its bite attack with a use of its Uncontrolled Burst or Madness Croak, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} per colpire, portata 5 ft., un bersaglio. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) danni perforanti.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pandemoniac Ideal (Concentration)
entries: The slaad creates the image of an object or creature no larger than a 20-foot cube. It seems real to all senses, though a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals its illusory nature. The slaad may interact with the illusion physically as though it were real.

action.name: Madness Croak
entries: Each creature (including the slaad) in a 30 ft. radius must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use its reaction to make a melee attack against a radom creature in range. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Uncontrolled Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each other creature within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

reaction.name: Lose Cohesion
entries: As a reaction to taking 15 or more damage from a single source, the slaad may disintegrate into a shower of fine particles, reforming at any point within 10 ft. at the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph itself or another slaad into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Disordered Transposition
entries: At the beginning of the slaad's turn, a randomly selected creature is teleported up to 30 feet to a location of the slaad's choice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} per colpire, portata 5 ft., un bersaglio. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) danni perforanti.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. The fire ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: Pandemoniac Ideal (Concentration)
entries: The slaad creates the image of an object or creature no larger than a 20-foot cube. It seems real to all senses, though a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check reveals its illusory nature. The slaad may interact with the illusion physically as though it were real.

action.name: Madness Croak {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature (including the slaad) in a 30 ft. radius must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be forced to use its reaction to make a melee attack against a radom creature in range. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Wall Lurker
entries: The slaad may pass through wood, plaster, or stone walls without resistance.

trait.name: Ambitious
entries: The slaad has advantage on attacks that target creatures with 14 or more hit dice

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks, one of which may be a bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called {@disease chaos phage|ConfC}.

action.name: Rending Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Resilience
entries: The slaad has resistance to the damage type of the last source of damage it received.

trait.name: Mighty Leap
entries: The slaad can leap its full movement without a running start. If the slaad jumps at least 20 feet, it may land in the space of any medium or smaller creature. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the slaad's space

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks, only one of which may be a bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vicious Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC: 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease - a minuscule {@disease slaad egg|ConfC}.

monster.name: Phaerimm
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The phaerimm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Dessicating Dweomer
entries: A creature that fails a saving throw against a spell or magical effect of the phaerimm's has any potions or other liquids it is carrying dry up, becoming unusable until rehydrated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phaerimm makes five attacks, one of which may be with its bite or its stinger.

action.name: Grinding Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition grappled} target. {@h}46 ({@damage 8d10 + 2}) piercing damage. A creature killed by this damage has its corpse utterly destroyed.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.  Instead of dealing damage, the phaerimm can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for the next minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Implant Egg
entries: The phaerimm makes a stinger attack against a {@condition poisoned} creature. If the attack hits, the phaerimm deposits an egg in the wound. The creature is {@condition paralyzed} and levitates 3 ft. off the ground until a creature makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom (Medicine) check to remove the egg, or until the egg hatches in {@dice 2d20} hours, killing the host. Each attempt (successful or not) deals {@dice 1d4} points of damage to the host.

reaction.name: Absorbption
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the phaerimm gains temporary hit points equal to 10 times the level of the spell.

reaction.name: Reflection
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, the phaerimm changes the spell's target to a creature of its choice that it can see within 30 ft.

legendary.name: Tortuous Compulsion (4th level spell)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage. A creature that takes 10 or more psychic damage in this way acts under the phaerimm's control on its following turn.

legendary.name: Wrack (2nd level spell)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. is overwhelmed with indescribable pain. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and be unable to stand on its following turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more subtracts {@dice 1d4} from attacks and saving throws it makes for the next minute.

legendary.name: Wretched Drowning (4th level spell, Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Blood wells up in the mouth and lungs of a creature, suffocating it. One creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and be unable to speak or breathe for the next minute. An affected creature repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

trait.name: Spying Eye
entries: The otyugh has advantage on checks made to hide while submerged in flith.

trait.name: Horrid Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Otyugh must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the otyugh's stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease filth fever|ConfC}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Weirding Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the nothic's eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the nothic, the nothic can force it to make a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the nothic magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically succeeds if it is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tempt With Knowledge
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet that has been affected by its weirding gaze. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. A creature that fails this save voluntarily is additionally {@condition stunned} for the next minute, and learns a 1st level wizard spell of the nothic's choice, which it may cast once per long rest without expending a spell slot. The creature may repeat this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the stun effect on a success.

variant.name: Note: Temptations
entries: The following spells are likely to get your players to accept the Nothic's bargain: {@spell Absorb Elements|XGE}, {@spell Charm Person}, {@spell Comprehend Languages}, {@spell Disguise Self}, {@spell Feather Fall}, {@spell Mage Armor}, {@spell Magic Missile}, {@spell Shield}.

Be careful giving access to Shield to your players. It's fine on a character with armor, and it's fine on a character with more spell slots to cast it more than once per day, but as a general rule you shouldn't give it to a character with both.
Alternately, you can offer some bit of plot or character-relevant knowledge. With it's weirding gaze, the nothic has an excuse to know just about any sort of secret.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 5 foot radius around the mind flayer is difficult terrain, as the mind flayer's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Dominate (Concentration)
entries: 30 ft. range, targets 1 creature the mind flayer can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom Saving Throw or be magically {@condition charmed} and under the mind flayer's control. The {@condition charmed} creature can't take reactions, and the mind flayer and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Enthralling Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. If a creature fails this save by 5 or more, it is instead placed under the mind flayer's control, per the dominate ability. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Break Will
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the mind flayer must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom Saving Throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and have its Wisdom score reduced by the same amount, to a minimum of 1. If this reduces the {@condition charmed} creature to 1 Wisdom, the mind flayer no longer requires Concentration to Dominate it. This reduction lasts until the creature completes a short or long rest.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The mind flayer teleports to another plane of existence.

reaction.name: Die For Your Master
entries: As a reaction to being targeted with an attack or spell, the Mind Flayer may force a {@condition charmed} creature within 15 feet to make a {@dc 15} Dexterity Saving Throw. On a success, the creature moves up to half its speed toward the mind flayer, becoming the new target of the attack or spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Non-Euclidian
entries: The space in a 5 foot radius around the mind flayer is difficult terrain, as the mind flayer's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

trait.name: Stalker of the Senseless
entries: The mindflayer is {@condition invisible} to creatures without proficiency in Perception. It uses its Intelligence modifier for Stealth checks, rather than Dexterity, and can attempt to hide without being obscured.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Dominate {@recharge 5}

The {@condition charmed} creature can't take reactions, and the mind flayer and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Plane Shift (1/Day)
entries: The mind flayer teleports to another plane of existence.

reaction.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: As a reaction to being hit with a melee attack, the Mind Flayer may force the attacker to make a {@dc 15} Strength Saving Throw. on a failure, the creature is pushed 15 feet away from the mind flayer.

entries: The space in a 5 foot radius around the mind flayer is difficult terrain, as the mind flayer's presence warps it into incomprehensible geometries.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

The {@condition charmed} creature can't take reactions, and the mind flayer and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.
